featured.text: However, the modern way of preparing this 31 snack may carry an unhappy secret.
They hope to find the secret of his success.
A man learns their secret and threatens to sell the water to the highest bidder.
The secret is: Never wait until the body is telling you you’re thirsty, since there must already have been significant changes in your body for it to eventually 28 your consciousness.

other.text: In this way, these secret shoppers may help a business gain a competitive edge.
The secret to bringing up successful kids.
They also believed the secrets in their families would never be 39 .
Though the family knows she cannot be killed, they worry that their secret will be revealed when they try to kill her.
For instance, he was 36 with many secrets in my family and our community.
Sometimes referred to as secret shoppers, mystery shoppers 11 regular customers to purchase items, eat in restaurants, make inquiries, or return items.
The secret power of green tea is its richness in a powerful anti-oxidant.

definition.zh_def: 秘密；不為他人所知的事物或信息。
definition.en_def: Something that is kept hidden or unknown.
definition.example: She told me a secret about her birthday surprise.
